mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This picture is a portrait of two girls, one older sitting in the chair the other younger standing beside the chair. The glass plate negative was inscribed with John Brown. This print was made from the original glass plate negative, which is housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portrait of Two Girls in Brown Family (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
